validator_network.title: Validator Network
validator_network.description: Select the validator High availibility service you want to create or join

validator_node_alias.title: Validator Node Alias
validator_node_alias.description: Alias name for your validator node (will be public)

validator_node_keystore.title: Validator Node Keystore
validator_node_keystore.description: Your Keystore/JSON file containing the private key that you want to use for this validator node

validator_node_keystore_password.title: Validator Node Keystore Password
validator_node_keystore_password.description: Password to unlock the uploaded Validator Node keystore

archipel_node_alias.title: Archipel Node Alias
archipel_node_alias.description: Alias name for your archipel substrate node in the federation

archipel_node_address.title: Archipel identity Address
archipel_node_address.description:
Public address from the keystore.
For validators, you will use this address to seal blocks

archipel_node_keystore.title: Archipel identity Keystore
archipel_node_keystore.description: Your Keystore/JSON file containing the private key that you want to use for this validator node

archipel_node_keystore_password.title: Archipel identity Keystore Password
archipel_node_keystore_password.description: Password to unlock the uploaded Archiel Identity keystore
